website_summaries.verdict: Specifically designed with a cylindrical body for both straightening and curling with lots of nice features for a professional result.
pros: Solves a common problem with an extra-long cord
Has a convenient swivel base so you can style from any angle
Heats in 15 seconds with 5 heating settings, each labeled with the temperature
Automatic shutoff and a safety lock for traveling are nice safety features
cons: Curling with the iron may take some practice, but it is easy to use as a straightener

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I never have written a review but I felt I should since this product saved me money and time. For the price this is a wonderful iron. It curls and straightens without making me feel like I fried my hair (which I have done in the past). Saved me money on purchasing another (not to be named) iron that would have cost more than double. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great flat iron. It takes a minute to get hot but when it does it’s really hot. I especially like this flat iron because it smooths and straightens the hair but it’s not so flat it’s straightened within an inch of its life. It still leaves the hair with movement. The clips and comb are a nice bonus along with the heat protectant glove.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Works great on African American hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good flat iron for the price. It does not snag the hair when you pull it through. I curled my hair with this flat iron and it made my hair look so full and bouncy!! I’m also African American and my hair was straight.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Dean

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this straightener. I haven't figured out the curling part of it but will be watching some videos next for that. Other than that it does a good job of straightening hair. I have super thick hair with natural ringlets. It usually takes multiple passes to get my hair soft and smooth. This one does a good job b/c it closes properly down on the hair and doesn't leave my hair looking crimped. The hair also doesn't get caught under the blades and rip out of my head like my last straightener. I haven't used the $200 one that is comparable with this one but I am super picky and this is a good straightener!!
customer_reviews.author: April R.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent as well as the product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this flat iron/curling iron! I've owned a Chi flat iron and I love this one much better! It heats up in 10 seconds and I like the dial that lights up on the side with the LED lights . You can see temperature settings easily because it's lighted. The ceramic plates on this iron definitely makes this a "one" pass straightener. It also is cylindrical so it curls your hair as well. I have very thick hair so I use the full 450 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: DragonLady

customer_reviews.title: She came to me after straightening her hair with the Furiden and said she absolutely loved it. It made her hair super soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this straightener for my daughter after the $200 straightener she had finally died after 4 years of use. I wasn't sure about it because the price was so reasonable. She came to me after straightening her hair with the Furiden and said she absolutely loved it. It made her hair super soft and you couldn't see any hair damage that she has. This is an excellent straightener and it is inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST IRON I'VE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this hair straightener/curler. I was looking into buying the new TYME Iron that came out but found this one that was so similar and more than half the price. After seeing some reviews, I trusted it enough to purchase it. Got it in today and curled my hair (WITH my clip-on hair extensions) and it not only curls/straightens SO pretty but leaves hair nice and soft and silky AND therefore made my extensions blend in so so seamlessly. If you're looking for a new straightener/curler, I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: daniarachel

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design of the flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of the flat iron. It glides through the hair smoothly. I use at the highest setting and it does not burn my hair. I have tried using it to curl and was not completely satisfied with the results so I will continue to use it as a flat iron. It was my hope that I could eliminate using my curling iron. I will,however, continue to practice with it. Perhaps there is a learning curve and I have not mastered the technique. Overall, I would recommend this iron.
customer_reviews.author: denise jenious

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Have used it for a week
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Have used it for a week, works great. Compared to the one I bought as $30, this is one is definitely worth the money. a little bit more expensive, but much better quality, and the result is wonderful. My hair is much straighter, and smooth. I feel the cheaper one is always over-heated, with the same temperature setting, my old one makes my hair smoky smell. But the temperature of this one is more gentle. Also the The package and the accessories in the box are very practical and quality-made.
customer_reviews.author: SpoiledBoston

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT! MAKES GORGEOUS CURLS AND WAVES
customer_reviews.text: This straightener is fabulous. It is so sleek and smooth. It doesn't snag or pull your hair when you are turning it. I definatly recommend a heat protection product if you have fine or thin hair. It straightens so smoothly or it produces different types of curls depending on what you are using it for. They last all day! I love this flat iron and will be buying more for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: SGarner

customer_reviews.title: Straightener/curling iron
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far but I'm obsessed! I will never go back to a curling iron. I haven't straightened my hair with it yet but just from how quickly it heats up I can tell it will do wonders. I'm looking forward to using it on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: C. Janosik

customer_reviews.title: Online videos and reviews helped me decide on buying this
customer_reviews.text: After researching a lot online and reading tens of reviews, was stuck between this and kipozi straighteners, some popular online comparison videos helped me decide to pick this and its been almost a month and I really like it so far. for anyone else thats stuck deciding between this and any other, check to see it the plates are titanium, these are, check to see if the plates are floating since they don't pull the hair when straightening. temperature control and locking capability are two other things that I was very keen on when making my purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Hair straightener
customer_reviews.text: Im a hair stylist I bought this because I'm always looking for better tools to do hair so Everytime I get something new I test it to know how it will work before using on my clients I love this I was able to straighten the top but have a nice loose curl towards the end without switch to a curling iron it has temp settings so you can have the heat you need its easy to use and a very good quality it passed my test I know my clients will love this as well
customer_reviews.author: melissa brown

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really do much for what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. It looks great, packaged well, heats up low or high...but for some reason, it doesn't really work and catches on my hair (pulling it) as I use it. I have used a flat iron for years, so I know how to use them. Not sure why this one isn't working as well. I've adjusted the heat and it still works the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great ceramic
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful product, with good accessories (thermal protection glove, velvet bag, comb and loops), very light and does not tire the arm when used for a long period. The ceramic is very good and glides on the hair very easily, it did not trap or damage my hair. The temperature control is very good and it is very easy to turn off, which prevents accidents or fires. I really liked it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth investing in one!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock and unlock latch, a plus for the 360 cord rotation and super easy to use. Curls turn out looking fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Gaosheng&King Yang

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to use and how it takes less heat to curl
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I wanted something I could straighten and easily curl my hair and this is amazing! I have a Chi right now and I cannot curl my hair without it seriously burning my hair. I have long blonde hair and this gives me really great curls. This is so easy to use and I like it has the heat settings and I don't need it extremely hot to use. I highly recommend and it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jen01234

customer_reviews.title: Excellent curling iron that doubles as a straightener
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a straightener that could also be used as a curling iron. This is perfect! The curved sides allow for easy curling without leaving an unsightly crease on the hair. I really like that the temperature control is on the bottom of the tool and has to be twisted to change the temp setting. The turn off feature is also located on the bottom so I don’t accidentally turn it off. I’ve noticed that I am not pulling my hair as tightly as I would with my curling iron and therefore feel like this iron is so much better for the health of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybeano

customer_reviews.title: Average straightener. Not a TYME alternative
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this straightener as a recommended alternative to the TYME product as noted but some reviewers. This does not have the same curling capabilities as the TYME which has the swiveling plates and curves to allow produce the curls without twisting and contorting the wrist and arm. This seems like a nice average straightener but is no different from the one I already have. If you're looking for a TYME alternative do not purchase this. As an average hair straightener it it just fine-nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Collier

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying thid
customer_reviews.text: I really thought I'd love this straighter, but omg I hate it. It makes my hair super staticky & for some reason really dry.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought me this iron but I did t have much faith at the beginning. Now I am a convert. This is because of the positive change in the way my hair looks now. I will of course continue using it. is frankly wonderful to look in a mirror now. I can now forget expensive salon visits.I can reecommend this iron to anyone. I am acareful shopper and had to really check this one out before buying. Happy to say my streak is still good. Iron works perfectly with my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: ARM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, my favorite straightener. I have used it multiple times. Have yet to burn myself, and my hair always comes out great. I love that it locks, and that you can control the temperature of it. I have thick hair so with most straighteners I have to do tiny sections at a time. This one lets me do normal sized sections, and works wonderfully, both, When I curl it, and straighten it. And straightening it doesn’t result in flat, dead looking hair. It looks like my hair is still alive and healthy, and not dead and fried. Well worth the money, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Silensky

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I still cant get the hang of this curler I have watched lots of video on Youtube still no luck so I deiced to resale mine at least to get most of what I spent back in my wallet. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: This heats up fast no waiting i have thick hair you have to separate ur hair in to parts like u do for any flat iron, curling works but u have to do it just right so im still working on that, however ill be getting rid of my other flat iron now
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wink

customer_reviews.title: High quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used to curl my hair with a Chi straightener and after 10 years, it finally broke. I thought I would never find something that I loved as much as my Chi until I started using this. If you have never curled your hair with a straightener, it may take some practicing but it is so worth it! This product is very sleek and just as great as the Tyme but much more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: My favourite!!! 360 rotating cable is perfect
customer_reviews.text: My hair is extremely straight and often times when I tried to curl them, they don’t stay long. Surprisingly, this curler helped my hair to stay curly longer than what I had in the past ***air, baby**ss What I love the most is how I can easily use the curler in any position, as the cable will rotate 360 (will not get stucked together). Check out my video and you will know what I meant. It is also nice to have the heat-resistant glove and the 2 hairclips on the side. Love the beautiful sleek design, hope this item will last long as I am now using them everyday :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, gets super hot!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll say that the main reason I bought this straightener is because it’s rose gold and matched my bathroom theme. I’m also lucky that it works really great. It goes up to 450 degrees and my hair is often really difficult but two passes and my hair is stick straight. Also, it has a locking feature so it’s super easy to store in the drawer. It’s a little on the pricier side, but I haven’t had any issues and it’s great quality. Look no further if you’re contemplating
customer_reviews.author: Lys M.

customer_reviews.title: A great styling tool at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent styling tool. It's versatile- straightener and flat iron in one. I like that when I straighten my hair I can slightly curve the iron in a way that my hair is doesn't look extremely straight. There is a soft natural straightness to it. If I decide to make it extremely straight it does a great job. I don't get creases with it. My hair looks more healthy and has pretty shine. I like that it turns off automatically after an hour if it hasn't been used. My hair continues to look good hours later. This styling tool is a great value for the price. I love it. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Died completely on 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron was AMAZING! I am giving it 2 star because it straightened and curled my hair like nothing I've ever used before. However, the third time I went to use it, it wouldn't even power on. I am so disappointed. I am returning to Amazon and I am not reordering because I hate to spend that much and have it die after the time in which I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sluggermom7

customer_reviews.title: Heats up really fast
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love the lock feature. Heats up super fast. Plates are smooth and never snags hair. Cord rotates at the base so no tangled cords. Cons: there's a little V cutout at the base that sometimes pinches my hand. This is the hinge for the top plate part to move. Most straighteners have the hinge at the far back, away from your hand. That's the only thing that I would improve about this straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: This straightener is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this straightener. You can change the temperature at the bottom and it clicks which I really like because you can't accidentally change the temperature by pressing a button near the handle. The design of this doesn't allow your hair to be caught in it and it comes with a heat glove and a travel case! I really like this so far and it is really effective!
customer_reviews.author: JessGans

customer_reviews.title: Close to professional
customer_reviews.text: Closest to professional grad without the price; that I’ve found. Previously I always bought professional straighteners through salons since my hair does what it wants. I’ve bought other straighteners and none were even close. This is close but can still tell the difference. Doesn’t seem to get as hot even though says it does. Stays heated. My hair seems to not hold the “style” as well as it does with the professional one; assuming due to lower heat. Love the auto shutoff and locking shut those are upgrades. For the price difference will see how this one lasts. My professional lasted almost a decade.
customer_reviews.author: KiKi

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful, well made, efficient flat iron
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, just an awesome flat iron. Waaaay better than the Chi's I have owned in the past. My hair is thick and curly. It took half the time to get my hair done than with my Chis. The hair clips that come with this are amazing quality, they hold so much of my thick hair. The heat protectant glove is a bit sticky, but super necessary! This flat iron WILL get hot. Truly heats up in 15 seconds, the lock future is so awesome for storage. The back plates glide smoothly through the hair and are gorgeous. Attractive design and feel. I love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L.M. Ash

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for straightening or curling my hair! It is easy to use, heats up quickly, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: RobbieBurke

customer_reviews.title: Fast Heating
customer_reviews.text: The straightener heats up super quick! It comes with 2 clips, one glove and an easy to store black bag. When I use it, my hair stays shiny and healthy looking and with the dial heat adjustment you can easily adjust it to the temperature that you like or prefer. The straightener is easy to use and it doesn’t pull my hair, it makes my hair shiny and healthy looking. I haven’t tried to curl my hair yet because I’m not use to curling my hair yet with a straightener but I’m sure with practice it will be fine because it has a round barrel. I was not disappointed after giving this tool a shot and I recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Straightens AND Curls 👏🏼
customer_reviews.text: This straightener is amazing! I personally use it for curling my hair and I love the way it looks. I find my curls to be more textured/ voluminous with this as opposed to my other straightener. There is a locking mechanism which is awesome, especially if you are traveling or have kids! (Can never be too careful!) Also, I really like how you can adjust the temperature with the “dial” by essentially twisting the base. It’s very user friendly/ fool proof. If you’re looking for an easy tool to use to BOTH straighten or curl your hair, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVING MY NEW HAIR STRAIGHTENER!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the result of using the hair straightener. It was easy to use and also lightweight. My hands did not get tired. I loved the glove it comes with, which was a full glove. I loved that it came with a comb and 2 hair clips to help in straightening. The fact that it came with its own pouch for safe-keeping was adorable. I tend to not straighten my hair like I used to due to hear damage, but I felt good using the straightener with a heat protectant. The next day, my hair still looks great and pretty healthy. I will definitely recommend this hair straightener! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diam0ndGir1

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky with my hair straightener. This one is very good. First, as a Mom I thank this for the lock feature. It helps me to prevent my toddler to get burnt and also it's easier to storage. The temp control is very nice because it's easy to set up and you don't have to push a button 100 times to set the temperature that you want. The heat lost is very little compared with my other one. I straighted my hair without any other product or hair blowing. And I like it. I still need to curl my hair with this I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Leidy M Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Waves... Not
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron.... Extremely disappointed in the curling aspect advertised. Unless you do it exactly right every strand then you won't get any good results. It's almost impossible to maneuver around for all sections of the head. Honestly the reviews on the product are either all professionals being paid or else they're using it as a stylist on someone else. Big fail with wVes and curls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it for keratin treatment
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a straightener for a long time that could hold high temperatures as needed for the keratin treatment. I am happy to announce that this straightener is top-notch and works as advertised. The straightener itself heats up fast and for occasional use, it saves me a lot of time, when I straighten my hair. It doesn't damage my hair as I only need to go over each layer once and it does the job. I am still getting a hang of how to do my curls with it but there are a lot of videos and I am sure I'll be a pro in no time.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold, use & heats up fast!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I was a little intimidated by the straightener when I first got it. I have big, naturally curly hair that I have damaged over the years by straightening. This straightener is pretty awesome. I love that it heats up right away and you know it. You also can easily determine what setting is right for you and it doesn't damage your hair, or at least it didn't mine while I experimented with it. I haven't tried to do waves yet, but I did use it on my extensions and it was also gentle. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking to buy, just buy.
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about buying it, just do it. I love this product. The lock feature gives me security when I’m doing my hair around my kids and don’t have to worry about them putting little fingers on the hot plates. I followed the instruction and went with the 320 degrees for dark or dyed hair and it went flawlessly. It’s went right through my frizzy hair smoothly with my last straightener it would take a couple of passes before the curls would straighten. I love the temperature gage on this, there’s no way you turning to a different temperature by accident while straightening.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great straightener and for simple curls
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Gets hot and great at straightening. I don’t even put it at the hottest setting. I use the next to last. It has several temp settings. Con- Only taking one star off because it does curl. I specifically wanted to do a more complex curl/wave that calls for twisting the barrel once you’ve wrapped quite of bit of hair starting a few inches below the root. Plus, I have long, waist length hair. For this reason, I needed the hot plates to be longer like a curling iron. As a result, my hair falls out of the plates as I’m twisting using this tool. So I just use it to straighten and then curl the ends.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ledezma

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: Best flat iron I've ever used. Leaves hair incredibly smooth and shiny. I have extremely fine hair and after using it can get up in the morning after sleeping and hair falls right back into shape that I flattened it day before. HIGHLY Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Sacco

customer_reviews.title: didn't work on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I tried to straighten my hair and after about 4 times of trying I gave, so I tried to curl it more and it would even curl. no matter what temperature or how little hair I used it just didn't do anything other then heat my hair. returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Took it out the box and already broke
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous in ordering this because of the mixed reviews. I decided to get it and see for myself. As soon as I opened it up the lock button was in the lock position and the clamps were open, I tried to push it back and forth to see if it would lock and nothing worked. I figured since that was broke and some of the reviews I read I wasn't going to even try heating it up. I would rather just sent it back. I have ordered another style that I think will maybe be a little easier for me to use to curl my hair.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great straightener/curling wand combo
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new straightener & like how this one was marketed to curl & straighten. I’ve had stylists that have curled my entire head with a straightener & I’ve never been able to figure out how. This straightener “locks” to allow for easier control. My curling technique still needs a lot of work, but it’s much easier to do compared to my previous straightener. It straightens wonderfully, & has 5 different heat setting options. It comes with a bag, comb, heat protected glove, & hair clips.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Schauer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me. This is a great hair straightener. It also is so easy to make curls too. My hair is very thick and curly and this straightener makes my hair soft and smooth. It heats up very fast and takes very little time to go through all of my hair. I recommend this straightener. The only thing is that sometimes the outside gets a little warm but has not burnt me at all. I have had this for about a year now I believe and still works like the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: DWend

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My previous straightener went bad and I haven't straightened my hair for a long time because of it. I've really missed it! I decided to give this a try after reading so many positive reviews and there is a reason why. I also love that these have a wide range of temperature so you can easily adjust the heat according to your hair type. My favorite part of this product is that you can "lock" the straightener so it's not always "open". This makes it easy to store and carry. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking there was no way I would figure out how to use the curling part of it since I am awful with curling irons and curling my own hair. However, I FIGURED IT OUT!!!! It was a bit hard to curl the back of my hair but I did it!!! I love how quickly it warms up literally in less than 20 seconds. It doesn't grab my hair and pull it when straightening. A really good product overall and DEFINITELY recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Best straightener I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: So, I had been searching for a new hair straightener and curler for a couple of weeks, and I saw this Furiden. I read several reviews and watch videos about it. Most were really great reviews, that’s why I was so convinced to get one. The day I got it, I was so excited to use it. Am no expert when it comes to curling hair the best, but this one just make it easy for me. With (probably) 3 tries, i was able to get what i want. The straightener is divine! Also, their support is the best!
customer_reviews.author: EGFlinn

customer_reviews.title: 15 second heat up time!!!
customer_reviews.text: This straightener heats up in 15 seconds! I turned it all the way to 450° and literally in 15 seconds it was ready to go. This is much faster than a con air or my Chi straightener. The cord is very long and swivels as you turn it! I like that it came with a cord wrap too. The clips and glove came in handy as well because this gets hot! I used my Chi heat spray and no damage was done to my hair. It glides easily. There is a lock feature to keep it closed and also a pouch to store it in. Overall this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: K teach & mom

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This iron heats up fast, makes my hair smooth & shiny, (not frizzy) whether I straighten or curl. Easy to adjust the temp and I like the length, weight of the iron itself....good quality. My only suggestion is to make a non-slip grip for the handle because it's quite slippery...It slipped out of my hand twice. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: ThaiGirLillie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome straightener and curler combo
customer_reviews.text: My flat iron finally died and I looked for a replacement that was able to flat iron and straighten my hair. I chose this one based on the great reviews. I have used it several times and I love it! It makes beautiful curls and my hair looks nice and shiny after using this tool. My hair tools usually last a really long time and I wanted to make sure I made the right choice for a hair tool. This one is definitely sturdy and high quality and seems like it will last a really long time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Leiva

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I wish I still had the box. Don’t waste your money. I don’t have curly hair but thick! I read the reviews and honestly it doesn’t match up!!! Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the free clips and glove
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I am now my own hair stylist. Covid 19 has probably made me realize I can actually do my own hair. I was actually trying to see where to get a good straightener for my hair so it could look professionally done. The hair straightener got the job done. I won’t say my hair looks a 100% but it is definitely close. I think it is worth buying and I will definitely refer my friends to it. I like that it comes with two hair clips and one glove. The straightener can be pretty hot. So I guess it’s a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Lotty Darling

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Stylish - The color is vibrant too
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it to help me curl and style my hair before my house warming party. The power settings are amazing and give you full control on the temperature at which you want to style your hair. This can drastically the number of mishaps that lead to burned and fallen hair. The length of the cord is long enough to sit in the chair in front of the mirror while plugged in and thick enough to not get tangled. The product comes with a tail comb, 2 partitioning clips, heat resistant gloves, and a black velvet storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Shaifali Juneja

customer_reviews.title: Works on stubborn hair.
customer_reviews.text: My beloved flat iron retired after 12 years of work and I wanted something that flattened my frizzy hair, and made it look nice. This one works great on my stubborn hair! I like how I can put soft curl in my hair and give it dimension or wear it perfectly straight. It comes with a nice storage bag, I love how the cord rotates on the iron and has a nice way of outing it away (great for travel). I posted a picture of before... and after.
customer_reviews.author: 2kids

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best flat iron i have ever owned!My last flat iron was a T3 that i have had for over 15 years and it needed to be replaced! I am very happy with this one, heats quickly and leaves my hair straight and smooth you would never know I had super curly hair to begin with. I also love the fact that it is 2-1 and you can curl the bottoms to give yourself a wave and not just have stick straight hair. Definitely recommending this one to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, in 3 mins is ready, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Arlette Anguiano

customer_reviews.title: Becky With The Good Hair :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend who just opened a small salon out of her house she loves it. Especially the 360° swivel cord and it's nice an long which was a factor when looking at different one's. Needs to be staagain. Used it on a friend of ours who has thick and wavy/curly hair worked awesome gotta love the temperature control and when u wanna store it it locks closed unlike older versions that would take up space. Note: I did try to upload pictures but, is not letting me while try agin.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCann Apostle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Gets super hot, maybe too hot. The whole being able to curl as you drag the iron down the shaft of the hair is bogus. Doesn’t work like that at all. Takes a lot of hand strength to squeeze it closed as you curl. It’s fine for a flat iron, but you could get a less expensive and more effective flat iron in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this product works so well. What I love about this product is that it heats up in minutes (saves me lot of time), works better than my old one which I spent more money on and it gives little shine to my hair as well. Only negative is that it does heat up, so you have to be careful. It comes with glove, bag to put it in and 2 clips - which is great I think. All in all I’m very happy that I chose to go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Faster than any hair straightener I have used
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended me this after I used it at her house and it literally took me 5 minutes to do my hair. I usually take over 20 minutes because I have a lot of hair and it takes forever to straighten but this hair straightener is somehow just fast. I haven’t tried to get curls because I have a curly hair and prefer it straight, but I will do it some day soon and update this review. Long story short I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Miracle tool!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do product reviews because I’m busy and it’s just not something I think about. I have to say though, I love this straightener/curling miracle tool. It’s made doing either to my hair, straightening or curling, pretty much effortless. The floating plates prevent my hair from tangling and also helps to make sure those weird little spots that are hard to reach look as good as the rest of it. I had more expensive straighteners that didn’t curl like this one does. I’d recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Gray

customer_reviews.title: Takes practice but great curls and hold
customer_reviews.text: Day one--practiced for about 30 minutes. The trick for me was continuing to rotate as I pulled through the hair to curl. Otherwise it would come out half flattened and only curled at ends. Day two--picture included! I was able to create the nice wavy curls I was going for! Day three--I struggled and just straightened instead, which the straightener worked well and was really easy to create a nice inward curl at the ends. Due to the practice it takes I'm only giving 4 stars but I do really like it and will not be returning.
customer_reviews.author: LMC14

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and helpful at the same time
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I love this straightener is because it does the job of both straightener and a curler. It heats up instantly at the desired temperature and styles my hair smoothly. For the price it is totally worth it as it does both the job. Styling my hair had never been this easy. I can curl/straighten my hair in no time. It leaves my hair fizz free and silky looking. I totally recommend this product to someone who is not much advance in styling their hairs because I definitely am not good at styling my hairs. Amazing product for styling hair in no time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Needs practice
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t made my mind up about this yet. I bought this as I have natural “waves/crimps” in my hair and often need to straiten my hair a day prior to curling to get nice, smooth curls. Was hoping this would smooth my hair as well as give me the body and curl at once. It’s definitely tricky for me to figure out a good technique.. Going to give this a few more attempts but my curling wand seems best at this point as it doesn’t pull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best strengthen/ curling iron I have had
customer_reviews.text: This is so far the best straightener/ curling ironing I have ever bought!!! The quality is amazing and it comes with many accessories such gloves, hair hangers clips, comb and a cute bag, which I use to keep all the things in it. The strengthen mode ironing is great, it heats up very very fast. The curling mode is also very great, to make the curling perfect takes a lil of practice but anyone can do it. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dayane Lima

customer_reviews.title: Works same as Tyme, less than half $$
customer_reviews.text: Like most other people, I refused to spend $200 on the Tyme iron, so after much research, I decided on this one and I am more than pleased. I have used my friends Tyme iron so I was ready to compare the two. Being the barrel is round, and the plates are beveled, when u use as a curler, u don’t get that “bend” as you would with ur typical flat iron. It glides effortlessly, doesn’t snag the hair, and heats up instantly. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Tancona

customer_reviews.title: Easy smooth straight hair
customer_reviews.text: I have super frizzy and wavy hair and I've been looking for a flat iron which does very less damage to the hair and has good heat resistance. And this seems to be doing a good job. I observed less static small hair after use and that too without using any serum. I like the look of the flat iron and the grip, which is very important for me since I have to hold it for a long time to straighten my hair. It came with 2 hair clips as well so yay!
customer_reviews.author: Nitika Marwaha

customer_reviews.title: Rather use this to curl than my wands!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to get this straightener. I have a few expensive straighteners and wands and even one straightener/curler similar to this one that I usually use but this one is so much better! When I want straight hair it does such a good job but the curling is what it's really great at. It doesn't snag or pull my hair and it stays at the heat I put it at so I don't worry about it frying my hair. Ive only used it a few times so far but I already know it's my new favorite and I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April Dunn

customer_reviews.title: For long length hair too!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this straightener not only straightens, but curls your hair! It came with everything pictured also including a travel bag. The straightener heats up very quickly which I really love because I don't have much time to do my hair each morning. I have hair that's down to my waist and this curls the entire length! Definitely have to look up how to curl with it if you've never used one before. Super simple to curl with though! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable and safe alternative to Tyme iron
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product I had so far. Easy to use without even reading directions. I love the hair clips and go e that make the process so much easier and faster. My hair wasn't getting ripped by the iron like usually and has a nice smooth texture l. Love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Sofiya Bychkova

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: My straightener that my mom bought me 8 years ago gave out and I was searching for something similar. I like that it has a round look to it so that I can also curl my hair. It does not leave my hair frizzy! My daughter loves to get curly hair every once in a while and this straightener did the job! I enjoyed the gloves and clips that it came with to help in styling hair and also avoid burning my hand. See the pictures to see how nice it leaves the hair!
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira

customer_reviews.title: Very quality product able to make great curls
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, pin-straight hair naturally. I have never had a tool that I could literally sleep in the curls and still have them mostly intact the next day. This coming from someone who had to use a ton of hairspray to get curly hair for prom using a curling iron. I don’t even put product in my hair after half the time and the curls stay in. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: toomi89

customer_reviews.title: Great flatirons!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for it's intended purpose. I dont really curl my hair a lot so I cant review that feature just yet, but for straightening it works! Definitely gets hotter than my other flat irons and has good temp control and auto shut off if i forget they're on. I love that it comes with some hair clips and gloves to protect from the heat. If anything changes, I will definitely update you guys later.
customer_reviews.author: Imani J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair straightener with multiple hear settings
customer_reviews.text: This hair straightener justifies the name professional hair straightener because of the build quality, multiple heat settings, temperature control and when applied to worked on the hair, the hair looks so smooth and wavy that I cannot explain in words.. Will definitely buy again and heck I am going to tell all my friends about this and suggest them to buy one if they do not have one.
customer_reviews.author: sai charan

customer_reviews.title: It can actually curl hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using revlon straightener for last 12 years. When I needed new one I ended up likening this one but I had to order it twice. The first one i got was not locking and looked used so I replaced it. It’s a nice product. Straight my hair in minutes and make it silky and smooth. I like it cause I can curl my hair with it too. I like it’s fouling more then straightening. Over all I’m happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: asma

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The item did what was stated in the bio, but the issue is with my wife's thick hair not effectively straightening or curling her hair but our daughters hair -which is very thin/fine worked without issue. On the highest setting the item couldn't do what a simple 30$ one from Walmart could. SO if you have fine hair and not thick the product works great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair straightener!
customer_reviews.text: The flat iron comes in a nice black velvet bag with two clips and a comb. When I turned it on to 450 or so, it heated up to the temp I chose in less than a minute and keeps its temperature high while doing all of my hair. It can curl and straighten and has a cool locking feature. The barrel is smooth and cool looking- I love it! The price is awesome too, might as well be a salon professional type item!
customer_reviews.author: Ria G. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great at both straightening and curling!
customer_reviews.text: So wow I am real glad I decided to get this product! I wasn't sure about it at first but I think it straightens great, I put it on the highest temp. AND it does a really cool style of curl that I cant get from a curling iron and its fast when curling! I admit it took some trial and error to get the curl part down but once I did its super easy now and its my go to style, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Grados

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I will have to say I was skeptically because I knew nothing of this brand. But I love the design. The round barrel Makes it easier to curl. The plates float and move with the angle of the straightener so as to not crease the hair. It heats up so fast. And straightens with one pass through the hair, And it comes with a glove so as to not burn yourself. And did I mention that it has a lock feature so it won’t stay open and comes with a travel bag to keep it safe! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Register

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: Didnt take long to figure out how to work with my hair. I did thin sections by using the iron vertically while twisting it consistently while pulling down and away from my face. My only complains are if done wrong it leaves creases, sometimes it takes a couple passes to get a perfect curl (probably just part of the learning curve), if you have fine hair you'll have trouble keeping it in the iron and it kinda feels cheap. But overall I'm happy with it and I'll be using this regulalry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Straightener yet, easy to use, easy to Operate!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this straightener I was surprised but with it being round it gets roots more than the square one I have, I haven't tried to use the curl method but I'm sure it will be perfect, I have always just had a cheap straightener never would have thought about spending $65 on one. Lol I finally gave in and so glad I did it heats up quick all You have yo do is turn it to your desired heat also came with a glove which i didn't use but its nice to have, came in a box with a bag, clips and comb everything you need to get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek press😁  LOVE IT❤
customer_reviews.text: I really like this flat iron, it had a nice long cord, which also had like the swivel where it was connected, so that was really good, it didn't get like twisted up or anything, and it came with the heat glove, which is awesome because I've had other irons and always burnt my finger, and it only had like the 2 finger glove which doesn't help much. It gets hot quickly And locks shut which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: RAY FAM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to purchase this 2 in 1 straightener and curler. I have very fine straight hair and have owned a regular curler before, but I was very surprised by the curls that this Furiden product gave me. Absolutely love it and can’t wait to use it more often. Made my hair look shiny and smooth! The temperature control feature is also great as it will help people with different hair types get their desired results!
customer_reviews.author: IceLady

customer_reviews.title: Love this Iron!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iron. I have used many in past few years but this one leaves your hair smooth and shiny unlike others that make your hair frizzy. I do not like to use straightening chemicals on my hair to reduce frizz and this iron serves the purpose of leaving smooth hair without harmful chemicals. It also has various temperature settings for different types of hair. I have even tried doing loose curls with this iron and it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Namita Bhagat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing straightener!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this hair straightener! It heats up super quick and works really well. I am amazed at how smoothly it glides through my hair. I have very thick and wavy hair, and this makes straightening it a cinch! It's a huge step up from my previous straightener - it works much faster and doesn't seem to catch at all as I work it through my hair. It also seems very durable. The straightener clicks closed and has a velcro strap to wrap around the wire, which makes it much easier to store or travel with. The hair clips and heat resistant glove are a nice added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: great gift set
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly lovely hair straightener, with a bonus of clips! It heats up quick and the temperature control dial is in a nice spot to not bump or move and change. It also has a convenient locking feature that holds well. The Round design makes this straightener, not only great for straightening hair, but curling as well. You can do just bangs or your hold head, of curls, it came out just as good as my old curler. It is in lovely packaging that would make the nicest gift set
customer_reviews.author: IceQx13

customer_reviews.title: No burns, more volume in comparison
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have used a lot of hair straighteners before. Let me write what I like the most about this product after 5 days : 1. Doesn’t burn my hair 2. Doesn’t require too many steps ( just 3) to get your hair straighten ( even though my hair is curly) 3. Temperature range is good 4. It does not decreased volume of your head. Maybe this also depends on hair material as well, in my case I used to get less volume with previous hair straighteners.
customer_reviews.author: Jamala

customer_reviews.title: Pretty curls with youtube videos.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hair extensions as they dry wavy unlike my hair but also wanted to curl hair with it as well. The email they send after purchase shows you how to curl your hair with it, I tried that way and it didn't work out for me so I watched a couple you tube videos and found a way that works better. It can create nice, right curls or loose ones. The only problem I haven't been able to figure out is how not to get the creases at the top of the curl the flat iron leaves. The packaging is nice worth useful tools. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mel24522

customer_reviews.title: Straightens well, couldn't get it to curl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a straightener I had for several years and I love it! I chose this product specifically because I like the idea of using it to curl as well as straighten. The only problem that I've had is that I can't quite get the technique right to curl - maybe I just need a lot more practice. That being said, I mostly straighten my hair anyway and it works great for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Ewart

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this flat iron! My old one stopped getting hot and would catch my hair when I used it. This one heats up in 5 seconds! I’m not kidding. It has a light that tells you when it’s heated and I swear it feels like it’s done instantly. My hair feels so soft after I use it and it doesn’t catch or pull my hair. I’ve attached two pictures (selfies I’m sorry) of what the results are. First one is curled with the Furiden and second one is straightened. I also loved that it came with hair clips/a glove/a cover and a comb. My family tries to steal this from me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Blake

customer_reviews.title: Superb flat iron.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned couple of other flat irons before , but this one is FABULOUS! A lot of research was done before I made the decision to purchase this one, and I feel like it paid off. I received this new one 2 days back.Shipping was made so fast.I love it !.After I used this I felt - so smooth, and I was shocked that it truly heats up in 15 seconds, as advertised! It also does something magical to my hair, like it adds more shine like no flat iron has done before. My hair is , wavy, dry and thick! This iron worked beautifully on my hair. 10/10 would recommend! I am really happy with my purchase - SAPNA
customer_reviews.author: Sapna Parekh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have a big flat iron but needed a smaller one for getting the shorter pieces in the back of my bob and for those times when I want beachy waves. It's perfect. It heats up so quick which is freaking awesome. I have several different curl and straighten gadgets but this one is my favorite by far. Can't even recall the last time I used one of the others.
customer_reviews.author: JenLivingLife

customer_reviews.title: Great quality straightener that also curls
customer_reviews.text: This straightener is so good! Recently I cut my hair about shoulder length and realized straight hair made my new hair look choppy. I wanted a straightener that could work as a curler as well. I have a $200 straightener that doesn’t even curl as well as this one. It works so great! I like the swivel turning it on feature, and the lock switch works well. So far I am super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ellison

customer_reviews.title: For curly or straight
customer_reviews.text: I have straight hair and use it to make some waves and I love it. My two daughters (11, 13) started using to straighten their hair and it’s easy for them and save with glove. One have wavy hair and the other one curly. It comes with clips, comb, glove, bag. It locks and the cable swirls so it won’t tangle. Great product I would recommend to a friend.?
customer_reviews.author: Blanka

customer_reviews.title: Gold hair straightener does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! I really like that this straightener has a low setting for fragile and bleached hair it can heat up from 250 up to 450 degrees. It’s a beautiful gold color and has a circle end for curling. Heats up fast I recommend like any straightener starting on a low setting and working your way up if you feel you need it higher. Makes my hair nice straight and smooth. So far I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Professional-grade hair tool
customer_reviews.text: This was the first hair straightener I've ever gotten, and it works amazingly even for a newbie like me. The hair wand feels very solid in hand, and straightens my hair without burning it. I have super thin and porous hair (yes, it's not healthy...) but even then, this device works well. Also, I love the gold finish LOL. It being pretty is definitely a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ang

product_meta.title: Professional Hair Straightener, Flat Iron for Hair Styling: 2 in 1 Tourmaline Ceramic Flat Iron for All Hair Types with Rotating Adjustable Temperature and Salon High Heat 250℉-450℉, 1 Inch (Gold)
feature_bullets: 【 ONLY ONE STEP 】FURIDEN professional hair straightening with directional switch new design, only one step to rotate clockwise to desired salon high heat. The Revolutionary One Step straightener and Styler gives you ultra-smooth silky hair with the touch of a button.

【 LESS TIME 】FURIDEN best flat iron with MCH, a new heating standard for hair appliance. This flat iron curler heats quickly in 15s, Save Energy, More Durable, Lasts Longer, significantly reduces overall straightening, hair styling time compared to conventional hair straighteners.

【NO SNAGGING & NO TUGGING】FURIDEN 360°swivel long cord flat iron for women with floating plates ，balanced heat plates that move when you do. The floating plates with curved edges continuously adjust the angle to avoid snagging your hair to give you more control while styling.

【 BEST CHOICE FOR TRAVELING 】FURIDEN travel hair straightener and curler 2 in 1 with worldwide dual voltage (110-240AC) and auto shut off. The package included: Heat Resistant Glove, flat iron bag, salon comb and 2 salon hair clips. FURIDEN hair styler travel set is your best choice.

【 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE 】At Furiden, we have strongly confidence on our products. Every Furiden product includes a 6-month, worry-free Guarantee. If you have any problem or suggestion, please contact us freely, we will provide friendly support for you in 24 hr.
